trans-unit.source: Contains border styles for the cells in a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: A cellák vonalainak tartalmaz egy <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> vezérlő.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control allows you to fully customize its appearance, including the borders of the cells and headers.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>vezérlő lehetővé teszi teljes mértékben a megjelenését, beleértve a cellák és fejlécek szegélyek testreszabását.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> has <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellBorderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersBorderStyle%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersBorderStyle%2A> properties that allow you to set the appearance of the cell border.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>rendelkezik <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellBorderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersBorderStyle%2A>, és <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersBorderStyle%2A>tulajdonságokat, meg kell adnia a cella szegély megjelenését.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersBorderStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersBorderStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellBorderStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: However, if you need to further customize the borders, the DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle class allows you to set the style of the border on the individual sides of the cells.
trans-unit.target: Azonban ha még jobban testre szabhatja a határok van szüksége, a DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle osztály lehetővé teszi, hogy meg kell adnia a szegély stílusát a cellák egyedi oldalán.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Left%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Right%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Top%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Bottom%2A> properties of DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle represent the left, right, top, and bottom border of a cell, respectively.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Left%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Right%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Top%2A>, és <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Bottom%2A>DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle tulajdonságainak határoz meg a balra, jobbra, felső és alsó szegély egy cella, illetve.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Bottom%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Top%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Right%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Left%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can set these properties on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedCellBorderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedColumnHeadersBorderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedRowHeadersBorderStyle%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> to produce various appearances for the borders between the cells.
trans-unit.target: Adhatók meg ezeket a tulajdonságokat a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedCellBorderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedColumnHeadersBorderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedRowHeadersBorderStyle%2A>tulajdonságainak a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>a szegélyek a cellák közötti különböző megjelenésének eredményezett.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedRowHeadersBorderStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedColumnHeadersBorderStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedCellBorderStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Egy új példányát inicializálja a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"> </xref> osztály.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the border style for all of the borders of a cell.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi vagy beállítja a szegélystílust összes egy cella határain.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Left%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Right%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Top%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Bottom%2A> properties are not set to the same <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle> value, the All property value is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle>.
trans-unit.target: Ha a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Left%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Right%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Top%2A>, és <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Bottom%2A>tulajdonságai nincsenek beállítva az <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle>értéket, az összes tulajdonság értéke <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle> azonos</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Bottom%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Top%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Right%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Left%2A>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Egy a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle"> </xref> értékeket.

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is not a valid <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: A megadott érték esetén a tulajdonság beállítása nem egy érvényes <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle"> </xref> értékeket.

trans-unit.target: A megadott érték, ha a tulajdonság beállítása <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle"> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi vagy beállítja a cella az alsó szegély stílusát.
